rundown: 4-3 W vs New York Mets Bryce Elder: 6.0 innings, 2 earned runs, 3 hits, 1 HR, 6 strikeouts Batters: Jurickson Profar (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 2 RBI) Sean Murphy (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 2 RBI) Ronald Acuña Jr. (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) The Braves secured a narrow victory against the New York Mets, showcasing a strong offensive performance and solid pitching. Key highlights include Bryce Elder's effective outing, allowing only 3 hits and striking out 6 batters. Jurickson Profar and Sean Murphy each contributed significantly with 2 RBIs, helping to drive the team's scoring. The Braves managed to hold off the Mets despite a late-game push, ultimately sealing the win with a strong defensive effort.
